name: Warding Bond

components.material: a pair of platinum rings worth at least 50 gp each, worn by you and the target

description: This spell wards a willing creature you touch and creates a mystic connection between you and the target until the spell ends. While the target is within 60 feet of you, it gains +1 bonus to AC and saving throws, and it has resistance to all damage. Each time the target takes damage, you take the same amount of damage.
